content: drops design pattern no me-126 yarn group b ----------------------------------------------------------- **knitted cactus with seed stitch english rib and garter stitch the piece is worked in drops merino extra fine ** * **small** measurements height approx 9 cm / 3½ circumference approx 19 cm / 7½ materials drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g color 26 pistachio the piece can also be knitted with yarn from alternative yarn yarn group b see link below drops needles size 4 mm / us 6 or the size needed to get 21 stitches and 28 row stockinette stitch on 10 cm / 4 in width and 10 cm / 4 in height accessories stuffing and 1 small terracotta pot approx 6 cm / 2 3/8 tall and 6 cm / 2 3/8 in diameter ----------------------------------------------------------- * **medium** measurements height approx 12 cm / 4¾ circumference approx 17 cm / 6 3/4 materials drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g color 31 forest green the piece can also be knitted with yarn from alternative yarn yarn group b see link below drops needles size 4 mm / us 6 or the size needed to get 21 stitches and 28 row stockinette stitch on 10 cm / 4 in width and 10 cm / 4 in height accessories stuffing and 1 small terracotta pot approx 6 cm / 2 3/8 tall and 6 cm / 2 3/8 in diameter ----------------------------------------------------------- * **large** measurements height approx 14 cm / 5½ circumference approx 20 cm / 8 with large and small part materials drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g color 18 green a left-over of color 30 mustard - for flower the piece can also be knitted with yarn from alternative yarn yarn group b see link below drops needles size 4 mm / us 6 or the size needed to get 21 stitches and 42 row garter stitch on 10 cm / 4 in width and 10 cm / 4 in height accessories stuffing and 1 small terracotta pot approx 6 cm / 2 3/8 tall and 6 cm / 2 3/8 in diameter
